name: Reactor Overload
description:
Can you keep your sanity amongst all the chaos? These reactors are a heavy duty!

Reactor Overload is a puzzle-based game about running around a failing reactor, playing the various puzzles on failing consoles that need attention, and to try to keep the reactor afloat and working until you suddenly collapse.

The game features many various puzzles and minigames that will challenge you and test your skills and see how far you are able to last in this reactor meltdown! How long can you go? Play now to find out.
